RunSynchronousCommand.Path: cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\diskpart.txt" (echo SELECT DISK=0&echo CLEAN&echo CONVERT GPT&echo REM --- Create EFI System Partition ---&echo CREATE PARTITION EFI SIZE=300&echo FORMAT QUICK FS=FAT32 LABEL="System")"
cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\diskpart.txt" (echo REM --- Create MSR Partition ---&echo CREATE PARTITION MSR SIZE=16&echo REM --- Create Windows Partition (200GB^) ---&echo CREATE PARTITION PRIMARY SIZE=204800)"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\diskpart.txt" (echo FORMAT QUICK FS=NTFS LABEL="Windows"&echo REM --- Create Recovery Partition (1000MB^) ---&echo CREATE PARTITION PRIMARY SIZE=1000&echo FORMAT QUICK FS=NTFS LABEL="Recovery")"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\diskpart.txt" (echo SET ID="de94bba4-06d1-4d40-a16a-bfd50179d6ac"&echo GPT ATTRIBUTES=0x8000000000000001&echo REM --- Create Data Partition (Rest of Space^) ---&echo CREATE PARTITION PRIMARY)"
cmd.exe /c "diskpart.exe /s "X:\diskpart.txt" >>"X:\diskpart.log" || ( type "X:\diskpart.log" & echo diskpart encountered an error. & pause & exit /b 1 )"
